headline.main: HIT OIL INSTALLATIONS; R.A.F. Bombs Strike Bhamo -- Americans Cut Railroads

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, April 1 (U.P.) -- Royal Air Force fliers blasted oil installations in a damaging raid yesterday on Bhamo, Japanese supply base in Burma near Yunnan Province, China, and American airmen continued their destructive attacks on enemy objectives in Central and Northern Burma, it was announced today.
abstract: Brit naval craft sink 3-4 Jap launches, Mayu River
